TITLE: Music Rights Management
WELCOME: Welcome to the Music Industry Platform!
DESCRIPTION: Manage your rights, connect with artists, and grow your network.

AUTH.LOGIN_SUBTITLE: Sign in to continue to Music Rights Platform
AUTH.INVALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address
AUTH.PASSWORD_REQUIREMENTS: Password must be at least 6 characters
AUTH.DISPLAY_NAME_MIN_LENGTH: Display name must be at least 2 characters
AUTH.TERMS_AGREEMENT: By creating an account, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
AUTH.REGISTRATION_SUCCESS: Account created successfully! Redirecting to profile setup...
AUTH.BRANDING_DESCRIPTION: Professional platform for artists, labels, and publishers.
AUTH.BRANDING_DESCRIPTION_REGISTER: Connect with artists, manage rights, and build your network.

PROFILE.SETUP_SUBTITLE: Let's get to know you better

PROFILE.REQUIRED_FIELDS_ERROR: Please fill in all required fields
PROFILE.CREATION_ERROR: Failed to create profile. Please try again.

GDPR.COOKIES_DESCRIPTION: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website. By using our site, you consent to our use of cookies.
GDPR.COOKIES_DETAILS: Your privacy is important to us. Learn more about how we use cookies and how you can control them.
GDPR.ESSENTIAL_DESC: Required for the website to function properly. These cannot be disabled.
GDPR.ANALYTICS_DESC: Help us understand how you use our website so we can improve it.
GDPR.MARKETING_DESC: Used to track your activity and personalize content and ads.
GDPR.THIRD_PARTY_DESC: Used by external services to enhance functionality.
GDPR.DATA_EXPORT_DESC: Get a copy of all your personal data in JSON format
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_WARNING_TEXT: Deleting your account will permanently remove all your data from our systems. This action is irreversible and cannot be undone. Please make sure you have exported your data before proceeding.
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_ITEM_PROFILE: ✓ Your complete user profile and account information
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_ITEM_WORKSPACES: ✓ All workspaces you own and your memberships in other workspaces
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_ITEM_RIGHTS: ✓ All rights holder profiles associated with your account
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_ITEM_SPLITS: ✓ All work split percentages and agreements
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_ITEM_PROTOCOLS: ✓ All protocols, author declarations, and neighbouring rights data
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_ITEM_CONSENTS: ✓ All consent records and privacy preferences
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_NOTE_IRREVERSIBLE: This action is permanent - your data cannot be recovered after deletion
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_NOTE_COLLABORATORS: If you're a member of shared workspaces, only your membership will be removed
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_NOTE_EXPORT: We recommend exporting your data before deletion if you want to keep a copy
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_EXPORT_PROMPT: Need a copy of your data? Export it first:
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_CONFIRM_TEXT: This is your final chance to cancel. Once you confirm, your account and all associated data will be permanently deleted within minutes.
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_CONFIRM_TYPE_HINT: Type the word DELETE (uppercase) to enable the deletion button
GDPR.DELETE_ACCOUNT_ERROR_GENERIC: An error occurred while deleting your account. Please try again or contact support.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.INTRO_TEXT: Music Rights Platform ("we," "us," "our," or "Company") operates the Music Rights Platform website and application. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our Service.
PRIVACY.PASSION_PROJECT: This Is a Passion Project—Not a Commercial Service
PRIVACY.PASSION_1: This platform is a personal, non-commercial project created by one individual.
PRIVACY.PASSION_2: It is not a registered company, LLC, or legal business entity.
PRIVACY.PASSION_3: There is no dedicated support team, customer service hotline, or Service Level Agreement (SLA).
PRIVACY.PASSION_4: Features, uptime, and functionality are provided on a "best-effort" basis only.
PRIVACY.PASSION_5: We make no guarantees regarding reliability, availability, accuracy, or fitness for any particular purpose.
PRIVACY.NO_LIABILITY: No Liability for Damages or Losses
PRIVACY.NO_LIABILITY_TEXT: By using this platform, you acknowledge and agree that we bear NO responsibility or liability whatsoever for any losses, damages, data loss, or other consequences arising from your use of this Service. Use entirely at your own risk.
PRIVACY.GDPR_COMPLIANCE: While this is a passion project, we comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and applicable European data protection laws.
PRIVACY.INVITE_TITLE: Invite-Only Access & Right to Refuse Service
PRIVACY.INVITE_ACCESS: This platform is invite-only and currently in closed beta. Access is granted at our sole discretion.
PRIVACY.INVITE_1: Registration may require an invitation code or manual approval.
PRIVACY.INVITE_2: We do not guarantee access to everyone who requests it.
PRIVACY.INVITE_3: Your access may be revoked at any time without prior notice.
PRIVACY.WE_RESERVE: We Reserve the Right to Refuse Service
PRIVACY.RESERVE_1: We may deny, suspend, or terminate access for any user, at any time, for any reason.
PRIVACY.RESERVE_2: We are not obligated to provide explanations for denial or termination.
PRIVACY.RESERVE_3: We are not liable for any consequences of account suspension or termination.
PRIVACY.ACKNOWLEDGE_1: This service is experimental, subject to change, and may be discontinued without warning.
PRIVACY.ACKNOWLEDGE_2: There is no entitlement to continued access or uptime.
PRIVACY.ACKNOWLEDGE_3: We make no promises regarding feature availability or data persistence.
PRIVACY.ACKNOWLEDGE_4: Use of this platform is a privilege, not a right.
PRIVACY.CONTROLLER_TEXT: The data controller responsible for your personal data is the platform operator.
PRIVACY.CONTACT_TEXT: For privacy inquiries, use the in-app support feature (if available).
PRIVACY.GDPR_REQUESTS_TEXT: For GDPR requests, contact us via the methods above. We respond within 30 days.
PRIVACY.DPA_TEXT: You may contact your local data protection authority with concerns.
PRIVACY.VOLUNTARY_TEXT: We collect information you voluntarily provide:
PRIVACY.ACCOUNT_INFO_TEXT: Email, password (hashed), display name, optional profile photo.
PRIVACY.PROFILE_INFO_TEXT: Name, pseudonym/nickname, IPI, ISNI, PRO/CMO, contact details.
PRIVACY.WORK_INFO_TEXT: Song titles, ISWC codes, ISRC, release dates, collaborators, splits.
PRIVACY.RIGHTS_INFO_TEXT: Composer, lyricist, publisher, performer details, roles, AI disclosures.
PRIVACY.SPLIT_INFO_TEXT: Split percentages, signatures, QR codes, PDF protocol documents.
PRIVACY.USER_RESPONSIBILITY: You are solely responsible for the accuracy of any information you upload.
PRIVACY.NO_VERIFY: We do not verify the accuracy of user-provided data.
PRIVACY.AUTO_PURPOSE: This data is used for functionality, security, debugging, and improvements.
PRIVACY.MUSIC_TEXT: We collect music rights management data:
PRIVACY.NICKNAME_TEXT: Stage names or aliases you use professionally.
PRIVACY.IPI_TEXT: Unique identifier assigned by performing rights organizations.
PRIVACY.ISNI_TEXT: International Standard Name Identifier for contributors.
PRIVACY.CMO_TEXT: Your affiliation with organizations like GEMA, ASCAP, PRS.
PRIVACY.AI_TEXT: Whether AI was involved in work creation.
PRIVACY.NICKNAME_1: We generate a unique profile_id for each user.
PRIVACY.NICKNAME_2: You may create a nickname that links to your profile_id.
PRIVACY.NICKNAME_3: Nicknames are publicly visible if your profile is public.
PRIVACY.AI_DISC_1: You may indicate whether a work used AI tools.
PRIVACY.AI_DISC_2: This information appears on public work metadata and protocols.
PRIVACY.DISCLAIMER_TEXT: We are NOT a replacement for legal counsel or professional music publishers. This is a tool for personal record-keeping.
PRIVACY.LEGAL_BASIS_TEXT: We process your data based on:
PRIVACY.BASIS_CONTRACT_TEXT: To provide our Service (account creation, storing works, protocols).
PRIVACY.BASIS_INTEREST_TEXT: To improve the platform, ensure security, prevent fraud.
PRIVACY.USAGE_TEXT: We use your personal data to:
PRIVACY.USAGE_3: Generate protocol documents and QR codes.
PRIVACY.NO_ADS: We do not use your data for advertising or sell it to third parties.
PRIVACY.NO_GUARANTEES_TEXT: We make no guarantees regarding data accuracy or platform uptime.
PRIVACY.SHARING_TITLE: When and How We Share Your Information
PRIVACY.SUPABASE_2: Data Processed: Email, passwords, profiles, works, protocols
PRIVACY.AUTH_STORAGE_TEXT: Supabase uses tokens stored in browser localStorage for sessions.
PRIVACY.NETLIFY_1: Data Processed: IP addresses, browser data
PRIVACY.PROVIDERS_DISCLAIMER: We cannot guarantee third-party provider security or uptime.
PRIVACY.COLLAB_TEXT: When collaborating, your shared data is visible to collaborators.
PRIVACY.COLLAB_1: You control what information you share.
PRIVACY.COLLAB_2: We are not responsible for how others use shared information.
PRIVACY.LEGAL_REQ_TEXT: We may disclose information if required by law:
PRIVACY.LEGAL_1: Comply with subpoenas or court orders.
PRIVACY.LEGAL_LIMITATION: As a passion project, our ability to contest legal requests is limited.
PRIVACY.TRANSFER_TEXT: Data is primarily stored in the EU. Some sub-processors operate globally with adequate safeguards (Standard Contractual Clauses, GDPR-compliant DPAs).
PRIVACY.COOKIES_TEXT: We do NOT use traditional tracking cookies or analytics services.
PRIVACY.COOKIES_AUTH: Supabase uses secure tokens in localStorage for authentication.
PRIVACY.STORAGE_LOCAL: This data remains on your device.
PRIVACY.NO_TRACK_TEXT: We do not use Google Analytics, Facebook Pixel, or similar tools.
PRIVACY.FUTURE_CHANGE: If we add analytics, we will update this policy and obtain consent.
PRIVACY.QR_1: We request temporary camera access via browser permissions.
PRIVACY.QR_2: Camera stream is processed locally in your browser. No video uploaded.
PRIVACY.QR_3: If a QR code contains a protocol ID, we query our database.
PRIVACY.QR_4: We do not store camera images or video.
PRIVACY.RETENTION_TEXT: We retain data only as long as necessary.
PRIVACY.DELETION_TEXT: You may request account deletion at any time.
PRIVACY.PERIOD_1: Data retained while account is active.
PRIVACY.PERIOD_3: Shared work metadata may remain visible to collaborators.
PRIVACY.PERIOD_4: Backups persist for up to 90 days.
PRIVACY.PERIOD_5: Data subject to legal investigation retained until resolved.
PRIVACY.PERIOD_6: Server logs retained for up to 12 months.
PRIVACY.DISCONTINUE_TEXT: If we discontinue, we will make reasonable efforts to notify users and provide data export.
PRIVACY.RIGHT_1_TEXT: Request a copy of your personal data.
PRIVACY.RIGHT_4_TEXT: Limit how we use your data.
PRIVACY.RIGHT_5_TEXT: Receive your data in machine-readable format.
PRIVACY.RIGHT_6_TEXT: Object to processing based on legitimate interests.
PRIVACY.EXERCISE_1: Contact us using the information in Section 3.
PRIVACY.LIMITATIONS_TEXT: Certain rights may be limited by legal obligations.
PRIVACY.COMPLAINT_TEXT: File complaints with your local data protection authority.
PRIVACY.SECURITY_LIMITS: No system is 100% secure. We lack enterprise-grade security measures. Use at your own risk.
PRIVACY.BREACH_TEXT: We will notify you and authorities within 72 hours of a breach.
PRIVACY.CHILDREN_TEXT: This Service is not for individuals under 16. We do not knowingly collect data from children.
PRIVACY.WARRANTY_TEXT: THIS SERVICE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTIES.
PRIVACY.WARRANTY_LIST: We make no guarantees regarding uptime, accuracy, data backup, or legal validity of documents.
PRIVACY.USE_RISK: You use this platform entirely at your own risk.
PRIVACY.LIABILITY_TEXT: WE SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY:
PRIVACY.LIABILITY_LIST: Direct, indirect, consequential damages; loss of data, revenue, or profits; errors or breaches; downtime or interruptions; third-party actions.
PRIVACY.LIABILITY_ACK: This is a free, experimental project. We bear no legal responsibility. Seek commercial alternatives if you need guaranteed reliability.
PRIVACY.CHANGES_TEXT: We may update this policy. Changes posted with updated "Last Updated" date.
PRIVACY.CONTINUED_USE: Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.
PRIVACY.BY_USING: By using the Music Rights Platform, you acknowledge:
PRIVACY.ACCEPT_1: This is a passion project, not a commercial service.
PRIVACY.ACCEPT_2: No guarantees of uptime, accuracy, or reliability.
PRIVACY.ACCEPT_3: We bear no liability for damages or losses.
PRIVACY.ACCEPT_4: We may deny or terminate access at any time.
PRIVACY.ACCEPT_6: You accept the risks of using an experimental platform.
PRIVACY.NO_AGREE: If you do not agree, do not use this Service.
PRIVACY.NO_SUPPORT: No dedicated support team. Responses may be delayed.
PRIVACY.USE_INAPP: Use the in-app support feature or contact info in Section 3.
PRIVACY.DPA_CONTACT: Contact your local Data Protection Authority:
PRIVACY.FOOTER: This is a passion project. Use at your own risk.

PUBLIC_PROFILE.IMPORT_COLLABORATOR: Import this collaborator into your current workspace.
PUBLIC_PROFILE.SIGN_IN_TO_ADD: Sign in and choose a workspace to add this collaborator.
PUBLIC_PROFILE.ALREADY_IN_WORKSPACE: This collaborator is already part of your workspace.
PUBLIC_PROFILE.TIP_1: Use the QR code in the app to pull this profile directly into split sheets.
PUBLIC_PROFILE.TIP_2: All shared information respects the artist's privacy preferences.
PUBLIC_PROFILE.TIP_3: Once added, customise roles, percentages, and identifiers for each work.
PUBLIC_PROFILE.NO_PROFILE_FOUND: No profile found for this handle.
PUBLIC_PROFILE.UNABLE_TO_LOAD: Unable to load this profile right now.
